name: 5ster: Full
description:
A Paid game without ADS and IAP...

The goal of this game is to beat your high score by putting at least 5 fruits of the same color and type in a horizontal and / or vertical row. If there are 5 or more fruits, you will receive points and the group of fruits will disappear from the screen. After every move, three new random fruits will appear on a random location. If there aren't any moves left the game is over.

Your high score will be saved so the next time you play, you can try to improve yourself. Have fun with this free puzzle game. Without violence, just for fun and free. Suitable for young and old!


Features include :-

1) Simple UI
2) Addictive gameplay
3) Cool music and sound effects
4) View your current and high score anytime
5) Nice animation
6) See the next 3 fruits before which may be useful in scoring good score
7) No IAP, universal game and awesome gameplay!

Try it yourself!
